text:
Question 148) A teacher applies, during the five business days of a week, tests with four multiple choice questions to five students. The results were represented in the matrix.
In this matrix the elements of lines 1 to 5 represent the quantities of questions agreed by students Ana, Bruno, Carlos, Denis and Ã‰rica, respectively, while columns 1 to 5 indicate the days of the week, from Monday to Friday -respectively, in which the tests were applied.
The test that presented the most hits was applied in the
Monday.
B) Tuesday.
C) Wednesday.
D) Thursday.
It's Friday.
